title: Skagboys
author: Welsh, Irvine
snippet: He turns away, anxiously surveying the other passengers. Back in Leith they eagerly head up the stairs of Cables Wynd House, where Maria immediately retreats to the bedroom to lie down.

title: Skagboys
author: Welsh, Irvine
snippet: — Janey and the kids are devastated, he says, lookin roond the flat like he's just stepped in it for the first time and doesnae like what he sees. — I'm goin doon thaire . . . Cables Wynd House . . . lend a bit ay moral support.

title: Skagboys
author: Welsh, Irvine
snippet: Ah ken he's in shock cause ah've never, ever heard him call the Bannanay flats 'Cables Wynd House' before, unless it's tryin tae impress some rich festival bird fae oot ay toon.

title: Skagboys
author: Welsh, Irvine
snippet: The cab trundles down to Cables Wynd House, and ah reluctantly pay the fare. Maria exits swiftly n ah have tae run tae catch up with her.
